ref: 1845 *ut -- śārayati ʻ breaks ʼ, cf. śārayati lex. 2. *ut -- śr̥ta -- 1 ʻ broken ʼ. &rcirclemacr 1. WPah. bhal. uśārṇu ʻ to throw out ʼ; Or. uchāribā ʻ to break down forcibly, scatter, throw away ʼ; Si. ihirenavā, isi˚ ʻ to be scattered ʼ intr. formed from *usuranavā GS 84 (but wrongly < utsārayati).
Or. uchuṛibā ʻ to be strewn with force, strew with force, scatter ʼ, uchāṛibā ʻ to break down forcibly, strew ʼ (X uchāribā above).
